name: hex-hover-converter
description: Provides conversion between decimal, hex and binary numbers while hovering.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.Decimal.description:
Format string for decimal source values.
Any text inside <...> brackets is clickable and will replace the hovered text with the corresponding value.
Use the following variables: {decu} for the hovered decimal positive value, {hex} for the converted hexadecimal value, and {bin} for the converted binary value.
Clear this string to omit the conversion.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.SignedDec.description:
Format string for signed decimal source values.
This will be used only if the decimal value is prepended by a minus sign.
Any text inside <...> brackets is clickable and will replace the hovered text with the corresponding value.
Use the following variables: {deci} for the hovered signed decimal value, {hex} for the converted hexadecimal value, and {bin} for the converted binary value.
Clear this string to omit the conversion.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.Hexadecim.description:
Format string for hexadecimal source value.
Any text inside <...> brackets is clickable and will replace the hovered text with the corresponding value.
Use the following variables: {hex} for the hovered hex value, {decu} for the converted positive decimal value, {deci} for the converted negative value (if existing) and {bin} for the converted binary value.
{dec} is a special value that shows both positive and negative conversion values (if existing).
Clear this string to omit the conversion.

hexHoverConverter.formatString.Binary.description:
Format string for binary source value.
Any text inside <...> brackets is clickable and will replace the hovered text with the corresponding value.
Use the following variables: {bin} for the hovered binary value, {decu} for the converted positive decimal value, {deci} for the converted negative value (if existing) and {hex} for the converted hexadecimal value.
{dec} is a special value that shows both positive and negative conversion values (if existing).
Clear this string to omit the conversion.

hexHoverConverter.strict.hexRecognition.description: Recognize hexadecimal numbers only if they have a prefix (e.g. 0x or $) or suffix (e.g. h).

hexHoverConverter.strict.binRecognition.description: Recognize binary numbers only if they have a prefix (e.g. b or 0b) or suffix (e.g. b).
